name: rabbies
description:
new-year themed game I made in 3-4 days because of boredome and extremly limited resources (one potato laptop). Also it's EXTREMLY poorly optimized! wowza! 

it's very basic game, more of proof of concept that I can make multiplayer games haha

you play as rabbit who jumps around, avoid traps, and bring presents under christmas tree! but you can't bring more than 15 presents at a time because you are a stupid little bunny haha look at you (nvm you are actually perfect)

so, controls

a - turn right

d - turn left

hold space and release it to jump!

esc - exit

collect presents and avoid pesky traps! 

server supports up to 35 players, so if you cant connect it's either extremly popular either my orange pi couldn't handle it

if server doesnt work (no traps and presents), please contact me asap uldo@uldo.space
 but I will shutdown server anyway around 10-th january, maybe later
